survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee and stakeholder perceptions of the company's Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives and their impact on brand reputation and employee engagement.

questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure familiarity levels. Ensure options are balanced and unambiguous.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Randomize option order to avoid bias.
